## Abstract submissions for talks and posters
We are pleased to announce that [the call for abstracts <font color="red">now open</font>](https://www.conftool.pro/cen2023/). It will close on <b>Tuesday, 28.02.2023</b>, and notifications about submissions will be sent out on Friday, 31.03.2023.

## Short courses
We are pleased to announce that the call for short courses is <font color="red">now open</font>. It will close on <b>Sunday, 15.01.2023</b>, and notifications about proposals will be sent out on Wednesday, 15.02.2023.

Please find here the [announcement](data/CEN 2023 Call_for_Short_Courses - final.pdf), as well as the [submission form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd0w9owvLdP6h25MIAbkCXemlK3vWg6GgPj6GemXlcNdGcODg/viewform?hl=en).
